page.title: 06Risby Poor's Heath 1839
page.content: "And whereas it is in and by the same act charted that the said commissioners should assign set out and allot unto the Lord of the Manor of Risby and to the Rector and Churchwardens and Overseers of the poor of the said Parish of Risby for the time being and their respective successors for ever one piece or parcel of land,parcel of the said stretches and waste grounds within the said Parish of Risby lying at the top of Cavenham Lane and west of the Enclosures called the Risbe together with a piece of arable land called the 30 acre and extending from thence Northwards to the Bounds of the Parish of Lackford."
